features: DESIGNED FOR BABIES WITH SENSITIVE SKIN: Large open air holes on silicone pacifier allows for maximum airflow to the face so sensitive skin can breathe.
GLOWS IN THE DARK: One night pacifier for baby glows in the dark, making it easy for you to locate quickly at night without any stumbling and searching, helping your baby sleep better.
MADE FOR 6+ MONTHS BABIES: Our pacifier nipple is the best pacifier for breastfed babies, designed by parents and medical experts to feel like mother’s breast to comfort and soothe.
SYMMETRICAL SILICONE PACIFIER: The BPA-free silicone pacifiers for breastfed babies are made with our silky SkinSoft material and a symmetrical design that's ideal for jaw and teeth development.

HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort.
body.description: The MAM Air Day & Night Collection pacifiers for baby has a shield that is specially designed for babies 6+ months with sensitive skin. The extra wide air holes allow plenty of circulation around your baby's mouth and even allow you to peek at their little smile. One pacifier in this pack has a special glow in the dark feature that helps keep your baby's silicone pacifier in sight without having to turn on the light and disturb their sleep. All MAM pacifiers feature our trademarked SkinSoft silicone nipples that feel like mom and help babies transition from being breastfed to using a pacifier. In fact, market research showed that MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested*. The textured nipple stays easily in baby's mouth and is just the right size for your 6+ months old baby so their growing teeth, palate, and jaw will be safe. Additionally, the symmetrical orthodontic nipple shape means you won't have to worry about uneven pressure or fussing to turn the pacifier "right side up". **Market research 2010-2020, tested with 1,572 babies

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Pacifier That Brings Comfort and Peace
reviews.reviewText: The MAM Air Night & Day Baby Pacifier has been a game-changer for both my baby and me, earning a well-deserved five-star rating. This pacifier not only provides soothing comfort to my little one but also offers convenient features that enhance its functionality, making it an essential item in our daily routine.One of the standout features of the MAM Air Night & Day Baby Pacifier is its design specifically tailored for sensitive skin. The soft and symmetrical nipple, made from high-quality materials, ensures a gentle and comfortable experience for my baby. It doesn't cause any irritation or discomfort, even during extended use. This feature gives me peace of mind, knowing that my baby's delicate skin is protected.The pacifier's glow-in-the-dark feature is a game-changer during nighttime feedings and sleep. The ability to easily locate the pacifier in the dark without disturbing my baby's sleep is invaluable. The gentle glow provides enough illumination to find it quickly, saving precious time and ensuring a smooth transition during those late-night moments.Furthermore, the MAM Air Night & Day Baby Pacifier comes in a pack of three, offering excellent value for the price. Having multiple pacifiers allows me to have spares readily available, ensuring that my baby is always comforted. The included storage case helps keep the pacifiers clean and hygienic when not in use, making it convenient for travel or when on the go.The design of the pacifier incorporates air holes and a lightweight shield, promoting healthy oral development. The airflow prevents the buildup of moisture, reducing the risk of skin irritation and keeping my baby's delicate skin dry. The lightweight shield also ensures that the pacifier stays comfortably in place without causing any pressure on my baby's face.MAM is a trusted brand that prioritizes safety and quality. Their dedication to creating products that meet the highest standards is evident in the MAM Air Night & Day Baby Pacifier. It is free from harmful chemicals and BPA, giving me confidence that my baby is using a safe and reliable product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby loved these pacifiers. I wish I had them on my registry, as the ones on my registry she barely used. The pediatrician gave us a mam pacifier in a sample bag. Baby loved it. I had to order more. I personally loved that they glow in the dark. This is extremely helpful for middle of the night wakings. It allows me to easily locate her pacifier in the dark/night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves her pacifiers but couldn’t hold others very well at all, even if she wanted to. This brand is like the only one she can actually keep in her mouth! It works great for us. It’s also easy for her to grab, now that she’s learning to put it in her mouth on her own. We started using it around 5 months and it seemed to be a better size for her mouth than the 0-6 months.One of the glow in the dark ones didn’t work, but just glad we can use all of them how we need!

reviews.reviewText: We tried to switch his pacifiers but he is so used to MAM. Love these.
